Hydras:.

"My opinion about Maximals and Autobots hasn't changed"replied cooly 
Hydras"THEY have to be destroyed... Just exist the power and people 
who're strong to use it and weak to use it"

> "Tell me of your... stance. Your opinion on the Autobots, these 
Maximals, .. 
> even the Tripreds whom it was my understanding that you had an 
alliance with 
> them. Or even, what of your own troops? These so called 
Predacons?" She 
> stopped & looked at him. "What about the idea of being a real 
Decepticon? Let 
> alone having a real Decepticon as one of your own." 

"Four of troops deserteed, but they will pay it, no body can do 
atreason to Hydras and live so long, other were captured by maximals 
and I don't know what happen with them... But if they're killed, 
Maximals Will Pay and my spy will help me to do it. And i'm no the 
one decepticon in this Base: You're here in my side, Starstorm is 
other and finally Perceptor, altought he has an Autobot's name he's 
a decepticon."
